name: Go Mission: Space Travel
description: The next target of the Space Pirates is the Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 120 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Even on an 8-Bit machine a game like this would have been embarassing.  I've only seen a few minutes, but that's a few minutes of my life I died a little inside.  Valve couldn't pay me to play this crap.  So poor I'm not even going to bother giving it a rating out of ten as I usually do.
